IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: OPERATION OF PRIVATE CATHOLIC UNIVERSITY WHOSE PRINCIPAL ACTIVITY IS TO PROVIDE ADVANCED STUDY TO STUDENTS IN AN INTER-FAITH EDUCATIONAL COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: Christian Brothers University is a private, Catholic comprehensive university committed to preparing students of all faiths and backgrounds to excel in their professional and public lives by providing challenging educational opportunities in the arts, business, engineering, the sciences, and teacher education.
IRS990.Description: private catholic university offering undergraduate and graduate degrees in the tradition of the christian brothers. the principle activity of cbu is to provide advanced study to students in an inter-faith educational community.

OtherLiabilities.Description: Amounts Held in Custody for Others

IRS990ScheduleE.PubViaBroadcastMediaExpln: Equal opportunity statement and nondiscrimination policy is included in all official literature and promotional material including the student course catalog, the employee handbook, and employee advertisements
IRS990ScheduleE.GovtFinancialAidExplanation: THE UNIVERSITY HAS BEEN ASSISTED BY LOANS IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF TWO STUDENT DORMITORIES, A STUDENT CENTER, A LIBRARY AND A SCIENCE BUILDING. FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE RECEIVED FROM FEDERAL AGENCIES: PELL GRANT PROGRAM $2,441,704; SUPPLEMENTAL EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITY GRANT $150,000; FEDERAL WORK-STUDY $179,590; PERKINS LOAN PROGRAM $1,116,869; FAMILY EDUCATION LOAN PROGRAM $9,940,321; ACADEMIC COMPETIVENESS GRANT $131,550; NATIONAL SCIENCE & MATHEMATICS ACCESS TO RETAIN TALENT GRANT $80,000; MINORITY INTERNATIONAL RESEARCH TRAINING GRANT $215,427. TOTAL EXPENDITURES OF FEDERAL AWARDS: $14,255,461

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: All institutional money, grants, etc. follow the Financial Aid matrix that was designed and approved by the President's Cabinet, or if money was donated for specific purposes, by the wishes of the individual donor.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: SHELBY COUNTY HEALTH EDUCATIONAL AND HOUSING FACILITY BOARD

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the audit and finance committees review the 990, and An electronic copy is sent to the full board who will vote on acceptance and submission of the 990.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: PRIOR TO BECOMING BOARD MEMBERS, THEY ARE MADE AWARE OF THE POLICY. each year, THEY ARE ASKED TO FILL OUT A QUESTIONNAIRE DISCLOSING any CONFLICTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Approval by the board and the compensation committe is required for top management officials.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ENTITY'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: oversight of audit and selection of independent accountant

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Schedule G, Part I, Line 2b, Column (v)
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: to solicit grants on the behalf of christian brothers university
